result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ شُعَيۡبٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَاۚ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ شُعَيۡبٗا كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
result.translation: Abahakanye Shu’ayibu, barahonejwe nk’aho batigeze babaho ngo baryoherwe mu mihana yabo. Abahakanye Shu’ayibu, burya ni bo bahomvye kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
